t: How important is building a brand name for an author? - Wheatmark
s: June 10, 2023 - How important is building a brand name for an author? Very important! Most readers don’t remember titles of books as well as they remember an author’s name or the main character of a novel. As an author writes more and more books, it becomes increasingly difficult to remember single book titles.

t: Our Clients Say It Best ... - Wheatmark
s: September 26, 2023 - My journey into the publishing field was to find a publisher and publish my son’s book. I researched several publishing companies, directly interviewed many companies, had multiple Zoom calls, and spoke with friends who had published books. It was through a friend that I found Wheatmark.
